dmca.title: Blogger DMCA Complaint- Eleanodr Dacosta
dmca.body:
1. The copyrighted work at issue is the book entitled A Lovely Love Story written by Edward Monkton published by Andrews McMeel Publishing, December 2006. 

2. The blog where the copyrighted work is published on is: 
http://paradoxilistic.blogspot.com/2007/01/hmm_24.html 

3. I may be contacted at: 
Printed Name: Eleanor DaCosta 
Title & Company: Legal Administrator, Andrews McMeel Universal 
Street Address: 4520 Main Street 
City and State: Kansas City, MO 
Zip: 64111-7701 
Email: edacosta@amuniversal.com 
Telephone: (816) 932-6694 
Fax: (816) 932-6660

4. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted material described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 

5. I swear, under penalty of perjury that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. 

Signature:      Date:

This facsimile contains information which may be legally privileged, proprietary in nature, or otherwise protected by law from disclosure, and is intended only for the use of the addressee(s) named above. If you have received this facsimle in error, please telephone us immediately and mail the facsimile to us at the address below. Thank you.

4520 Main Street, Kansas City, MO 64111-7701 Tel 816.932.6700 Fax 816.932.6660
